top_opportunities.pain_point: Manual document review and analysis for legal discovery purposes is time-consuming, costly, and prone to human error.

top_opportunities.source: Industry forums, surveys, and interviews with veterinarians

top_opportunities.pain_point: Long wait times for customers to schedule and complete home services appointments, leading to frustration and potential loss of business.
top_opportunities.source: Industry Forums (e.g., Angie's List), Customer Reviews

top_opportunities.pain_point: Managing patient appointment schedules and reminders is time-consuming and prone to errors, resulting in delayed treatment and poor patient satisfaction.
top_opportunities.source: American Dental Association (ADA) Survey: 'Dental Practice Statistics'
